How Do i Use it.. it says only serching for games :S

You run it and then push the button "inject", it will be injected, BUT first you need to start steam. So
1) start steam
2) run exe
3) push "inject"
4) open steam and play CS: Source
5) join a server (preferable without VAC)
6) and you are set, you can config it (aiming and other stuff) by pushing 'INS' button, you'll get a menu, you'll see (also read the readme)
7) you will own
